overview: Two Chinese men go to Copenhagen for some reason. While one of them philanders around with various Danish and Asian women, the other falls in love with his Chinese tour guide, but takes time to have various drawn-out kung fu battles with a seemingly endless amount of thugs sent by his partner's overweight and very jealous girlfriend back home.
tagline: Very strange 70's collisions of Asian exploitation and Scandinavia exploitation
title: Adventure in Denmark
